      • openFile

        public static Path openFile(Component parent,
                            String key,
                            String title,
                            FileNameExtensionFilter... extensionFilters)
        Lets the user choose a file
        Parameters:
        parent - parent component
        key - location where the dialog is opened
        title - dialog title
        extensionFilters - optional extension filters. the first one is chosen automatically
        Returns:
        selected file or null if dialog was cancelled

      • saveFile

        Parameters:

        key - location where the dialog is opened
        title - dialog title
        extensionFilters - extension filters. the first one is chosen automatically
        Returns:
        selected file or null if dialog was cancelled

        public static List<Path> openFiles(Component parent,
                                   String key,
                                   String title)
        Lets the user choose multiple files
        Parameters:
        parent - parent component
        key - location where the dialog is opened
        title - dialog title
        Returns:
        selected list of files. Is empty if dialog was cancelled.

      • selectSingle

        public static Path selectSingle(Component parent,
                                String key,
                                String title,
                                PathEditor.IOMode ioMode,
                                PathEditor.PathMode pathMode,
                                FileNameExtensionFilter... extensionFilters)
        Generic open/save method for single paths
        Parameters:
        parent - parent component
        key - location where the dialog is opened
        title - dialog title
        ioMode - whether to load or save
        pathMode - which types of paths are returned
        extensionFilters - passed if a file is opened/saved
        Returns:
        selected path of provided pathMode or null if dialog was cancelled

      • selectMulti

        public static List<Path> selectMulti(Component parent,
                                     String key,
                                     String title,
                                     PathEditor.IOMode ioMode,
                                     PathEditor.PathMode pathMode)
        Generic open method for multiple paths. Info: Due to API limitations, only one saved file can be returned.
        Parameters:
        parent - parent component
        key - location where the dialog is opened
        title - dialog title
        ioMode - whether to load or save
        pathMode - which types of paths are returned
        Returns:
        selected paths of provided pathMode or empty list if dialog was cancelled

        public static FileChooserSettings getInstance()
